    • About Jason & Christina McIntosh


    The McIntosh Teamâs goal is to provide their clients with service that is second to none. As Savannah natives, they pride themselves on their ability to share their knowledge with buyers who may be moving to the area, or have found their dream home and need a team of professionals to assist them in getting it for the best price possible. The McIntosh Team provides sellers with accurate market statistics, aggressive pricing, and marketing strategies that will ensure they get top dollar for their home.

    The McIntosh Team does such a great job meeting the needs of their clients that over 70% of their business comes from referrals. They have a wealth of knowledge and expertise about buying and selling and are proven professionals, with distinctive awards for their expertise and commitment to their clients. They keep the lines of communication open, so your questions about the process are promptly answered. If you want a smooth and successful real estate experience, the McIntosh Team is only a call away!
